item.title: Randy Pausch Last Lecture: Achieving Your Childhood Dreams
item.description: Content requires Javascript to be enabled. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ji5_MqicxSo p.noscript{ background-color: #fefea0; border-left: 4px solid #fea0a0; padding: 0 0.25em; } Youtube - Randy Pausch Last Lecture | Achieving Your Childhood Dreams

item.title: Shane Warne - The Leader
item.description: Color me surprised, I was amazed by his replies. Here is my favourite one Harsha Bhogle: What you strive to do as a leader?

item.title: WWDC 2010 - iPhone 4
item.description: iPad didn’t replace common tasks. Steve was referring his notepad on stage:). Old habits die hard. Steve can still memorize 24 countries and repeat them in the same order.

item.title: Download Apple WWDC Keynote videos
item.description: I was always disappointed with Apple Keynote pages. It allows you to stream and watch the videos with QuickTime which is not great for streaming and videos are not HTML5 yet.

item.title: Steve Jobs - Stanford Commencement Address
item.description: Steve Jobs - Standford commencement address 2005. Jobs at his best. Content requires Javascript to be enabled.
